Summer Kisses, Winter Tears (多少柔情多少泪)

06 Dec 2004

猫王的经典老歌，我就不多说了，回忆一下吧～！ ---------------------------------------------- 歌词： Summer kisses winter tears That was what she gave to you Never thoug I'd travel all alone With dream of memories Happy hour was all we know But I guess I can't complain For I still recall the summer song Thongh all the wanderings The fire of love the fire of love Can burn from atar And nothing can light the dark of night Like the stars they fade away Summer kisses winter tears Like the stars they fade away Leving me to spend my lonely night With dreams of yesterday The fire of love the fire of love Can burn from atar And nothing can light the dark of night Like the stars they fade away Summer kisses winter tears Like the stars they fade away Leving me to spend my lonely night With dreams of yesterday Leving me to spend my lonely night With dreams of yesterday Summer kisses winter tears ----------------------------------------------
